content: I am running a hapi fhir jpa server (using hapi-fhir-base 3.8.0) and whenever I do a search, it does not return every expected resource from my db. For example, if you hit [fhir_base]/Patient?_count=20 , the resulting JSON has the value "total" at 13 (which is the number of expected Patients) but the "entry" array only contains 2 entries. What am I doing wrong?
